message.body: Maybe an hour? When are you free?
Yeah whenever works for you Mattie. Let me know
I just want you to be able to talk and not too exhauasted if that's OK
Everything will be ok. I think the world of you.
My heart hurts so much. But thanks for your kindness and patience. I think the world of you Martha. Sometimes I don't understand how this world works.
Me neither so I got a tattoo about it. I'll say it again though - everything will be ok.
Ok but not good. But I guess that'll have to be enough. It's a wonder indeed.
And Happy v day. In the most appropriately loving way.
Still can't sleep I need you. I'm not OK
I want to be supportive but I can't enter the world of those last two texts. Please respect those boundaries.
(01/02) I'm sorry I said that, Im still figuring this out. God I need your help if you can give it Mattie. What do you tell yourself to help you make it through
(02/02) the day? Are there any positives that I can rationalize my misery with? What do you tell yourself when you aren't able to concentrate at all?
Distract distract distract. Worry about money. Obsess about school. Remember that all relationships fail until one doesn't.
My ohone's dying and I lost my charger so I am turning it off and won't be able to talk. I'm not ignoring you.
Ok I hope so badly. I try so hard but those thoughts all lead to you. I desperately need some good thoughts.
